title: Can we safely say that Narendra Modi is the most important person in India after Mahatma Gandhi? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Most Important People in India are not the decrepit old Politicians or people who fought for our independence and died Martyrs!!   But they are those who they fought for... Those who they shed blood for...               The un-born children of India for whom thousands of Jawans live sleepless nights for whom any Indian man/woman would give their lives to protect...  With whom lies Our future... I'm sure Gandhi Ji would agree so would Modi Ji....  After all what would all this mean if we don't have a Generation to pass on Our Light...!!   The Children Of India #BeingIndian

No...  No one person can be bestowed that honor  and its safe to say that there are plenty who disagree with M. K. Gandhi ever being the most important man in the country... Everyone plays their part in the grand scheme of things... And like NaMo or Mahatma, everyone is replaceable.

Well is PM Modi a popular figure - Hell Yeah. But you can compare anyone in India with Mahatma Gandhi. He is like god to many including me. Now this statement dosen't makes me a congress spoke person as I voted for PM Modi. But he is a man which can be influenced with the politics of India. Like PM Modi wants to pass GST bill, Land acquisition bill but Congress and some other parties are making sure that he dosen't. Now kudos to Modi as he is trying but if Mahatma Gandhi would have been alive today and had to handle this situation then he would have bought the majority (And I mean majority of people living in India) on streets, engaged in satyahrah and in just a week GST bill, Land acquisition bill & would have got passed with 100% vote. That's the influence Mahatma Gandhi have for which people laid their lives (and its a fact). Yeah support PM Modi but I ain't gone a give my life for hum dude :)

See the thing is that you can't compare both. Although it is now globally agreed that the Indian PM has broken political orthodoxy and has redefined diplomacy...we cant compare him to the Father of our nation. Gandhi and his freedom fighter-brethren were the reason why we have Narendra Modi as a PM today...we should never deny that fact.
Time will tell. A person is judged in the future not currently. There is a mismatch here Mahatma is previous Modi is current - effects are seen later - so don't rush. Have patience.
